Here is what is making me (and other people) angry:

1) This section is called "Video > Movies DVDR",  and not "TS2DVD" or "whatever-DVD". 
A DVD rip is expected to live up to a certain quality being ripped from a DVD and not being TS/CAM hiding fake "DVD" rips

2) NLUPPER002 had put a headline saying:
"Transformers: Dark of the Moon (2011) V2 720p2DVD NL Subs DMT"
Notice that the "TS" that appears in the "fine small print" turned to be "V2" in the headlines!!.

What is the reason that keeps some uploader posting in the WRONG section and faking headlines is beyond my comprehension.

it only makes people antagonize the uploader instead of thanking him!

And finally, thanks for the time and effort NLUPPER002 , but to be honest i rather not download this but watch it in the cinema.

The problem isn't a problem for us who are experienced uploaders/downloaders. The problem for me, is to explain to my mother, grandmother, father and all the other unexperienced friends of mine, who are new to the torrent-world. They have no idea what to download and what to not.
And for them, the whole experience of torrents is ruined if the first movie they download, is posted in the Dvd section, named with a combination of numbers and letters and also have a well known Movie title in it. 
I say make an own section for the TS's and CAM's.
Torrent is about sharing, so dont forget about those who got their computer yesterday. =P
